body:
All Versions

  • Measure Access: Allow users to optionally create Accessibility Specifications based on CMS/CBSA County Type designations rather than just current USR designations
  • Confidence Scoring: Replaced current thumb tool tip ("X% confidence"), with "Many/Some/Few sources confirm this address/specialty" (depending on the score band and data type)
  • Confidence Scoring: Replaced the current score in the export (a numeric between 0-100) with "High/Medium/Low" (depending on the score band)
